name: JustRandomGuyWhoWantsToKillEveryBody
description:
Description 

The game is still in development.

JustRandomGuyWhoWantsToKillEveryBody is a  Shoot 'Em Up game created for Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3. 

In this game you will need to kill innocent people just because (and they also give coins for this).

The less health points you have, the more coins you get.

...

P.S.   Every sprite in this game was made with pencil and paper.

          And yes, I don't know how to name this game.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

Mouse - Move Left/Right LMB - Shoot RMB - Dash
